title: Riot's Client so bad it ruins rank
body: So 3 times today in champion select my client has crashed because this client is sho shitty....now i'm on a 30 minute game penalty when the ranked deadline is nearing and I lost a total of 35 lp for it. THANK YOU RIOT for the worlds worst client causing people to get banned and derank.

replies.body:
The issue you're describing is ordinarily caused by a *poor connection to the servers*. Conflicting network settings on your local network are common culprits for this, so I'd recommend taking a look at our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure your settings are all good for League.

Let me know if these steps helped.

It's not the connection to the servers that's the issue...it's the client. It constantly gets bug splat and i've never had any other game or program crash more than once on my computer. League on the other hand. The client actually crashes and bug splats at least 2 times a day. I've tried a fresh re-install, running as admin. nothing seems to fix it. My brothers usually have the same issue.

Bug splats are an entirely different matter and are usually caused by a poor driver or hardware interaction with your computer. This is commonly resolved by checking your drivers/hardware while working through our [Bugsplat Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes), so I'd really like you to give those steps a go.

Should you continue to experience these Bugsplats after working through those steps, we can investigate further.
